subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Having given up the first goal in 7 of 10 World Cup qualifiers last year, the U.S. is hoping not to play catch-up against Slovenia on Friday.
snippet: Having given up the first goal in 7 of 10 World Cup qualifiers last year, the U.S. is hoping not to play catch-up against Slovenia on Friday.
